Smelerty.requires: |Progressive Tinkers Smeltery:3| AND (|Gravel sapling| OR ({YamlDisabled(use_saplings)} AND |Gravel|)) AND (|Sand sapling| OR ({YamlDisabled(use_saplings)} AND |Sand|)) AND |Grout| AND |Lava| AND (|Petrified sapling| OR ({YamlDisabled(use_saplings)} AND |Cobble|) OR |Water|)

Nether.requires: |Progressive Tinkers Smeltery:3| AND (|Gravel sapling| OR ({YamlDisabled(use_saplings)} AND |Gravel|)) AND (|Sand sapling| OR ({YamlDisabled(use_saplings)} AND |Sand|)) AND |Grout| AND |Nether| AND |Lava| AND (|Petrified sapling| OR ({YamlDisabled(use_saplings)} AND |Water|) or |Cobble|) and (|Iron sapling| OR ({YamlDisabled(use_saplings)} and |Iron|))

Diamonds.requires: (|Silver sapling| AND |Gold sapling| AND |Lapis sapling| AND |Grass Block| AND |Iron sapling| AND |Petrified sapling|) or ({YamlDisabled(use_saplings)} AND |Diamonds|)

ME Storage.requires: |Progressive Tinkers Smeltery:3| AND (|Gravel sapling| OR ({YamlDisabled(use_saplings)} AND |Gravel|)) AND (|Sand sapling| OR ({YamlDisabled(use_saplings)} AND |Sand|)) AND |Grout| AND |Certus Quarts| AND (|Greenheart sapling| or ({YamlDisabled(use_saplings)} and |Slimeballs|)) AND (|Copper sapling| OR ({YamlDisabled(use_saplings)} and |Copper|)) AND (|Iron sapling| OR ({YamlDisabled(use_saplings)} and |Iron|)) AND |Water| AND |Lava| AND (|Netherrack sapling| or ({YamlDisabled(use_saplings)} and |Quarts|)) AND |Generator| AND |Village| and (|Glowstone sapling| or ({YamlDisabled(use_saplings)} and |Glowstone|)) and |Sky Stone| and (|Silver sapling| AND |Gold sapling| AND |Lapis sapling| AND |Grass Block| AND |Petrified sapling|) or ({YamlDisabled(use_saplings)} AND |Diamonds|)

TF.requires: (|Silver sapling| AND |Gold sapling| AND |Lapis sapling| AND |Grass Block| AND |Iron sapling| AND |Petrified sapling|) or ({YamlDisabled(use_saplings)} AND |Diamonds|) AND |Grass Block| AND (|Iron sapling| OR ({YamlDisabled(use_saplings)} AND |Iron|)) AND ((|Petrified sapling| OR {YamlDisabled(use_saplings)} AND |Cobble|) OR |Lava|) AND |Water|

Iron.requires: |Progressive Tinkers Smeltery:3| AND (|Gravel sapling| OR ({YamlDisabled(use_saplings)} AND |Gravel|)) AND (|Sand sapling| OR ({YamlDisabled(use_saplings)} AND |Sand|)) AND |Grout| AND |Lava| AND (|Petrified sapling| OR ({YamlDisabled(use_saplings)} AND |Cobble|) OR |Water|) AND (|Iron sapling| OR ({YamlDisabled(use_saplings)} AND |Iron|))
